title: WEC Ocala Spring — Stay, Dine & Essentials Guide
content_html:
WEC Ocala Spring — Stay, Dine & Essentials Guide

Stay
The Equestrian Hotel anchors WEC Ocala with cart-easy access to arenas and amenities.
The Riding Academy Hotel sits within walking distance for a midscale option.
Ocala RV Camp Resort provides simple setups ten minutes away. Nearby chain hotels like SpringHill Suites and Hilton Ocala serve off-grounds travelers.

Dine
At the venue, Stirrups Restaurant overlooks the Grand Arena, and Emma’s Patisserie handles mornings with pastries and coffee.
Darrell’s Diner offers classic breakfasts, while Ipanema Brazilian Steak House in town makes a reliable evening option.
For fast bites, Marco's Pizza, Roma?’s Italian, and Jersey Mike’s Subs are all within a short drive.

Essentials
Publix, Walgreens, and CVS cover everyday needs. For tack and supplies, Contour Saddlery, Tack Shack of Ocala, and TT Distributors stock reliable selections. On-grounds, Exceptional Equestrian offers boutique-gear for riders.

Locale
Downtown Ocala gives a calm off-grounds reset with parks, errands, and casual dining. Everything required is within a ten-minute drive.
